DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop validate predictive model clinical outcome base result web-based self-reporting symptom diary Crohn 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Model Clinical Outcomes Using Web-based Self-reporting Symptom Diary Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose Crohn 's disease within 6 month Must record symptom webbased symptom diary least 4 consecutive time 2 month . Not able use smart phone .
